entry.headline: REG-Pfizer Inc Wide-Reaching Global Survey Reveals Majority of Women Living with Metastatic Breast Cancer Desire Increased Public Attention
entry.body: * One in Two Women (53 percent) With Metastatic Breast Cancer Believe the Disease Receives Too Little Public Attention * Most Women (75 percent) Proactively Seek Out Information on Metastatic Breast Cancer, Yet 51 percent Find Available Information is Often Insufficient or Ineffective * Despite the Large Number of Women Living with Metastatic Breast Cancer, Their Needs Often go Unreported NEW YORK--(Business Wire)-- A new global survey of 950 women living with metastatic breast cancer (MBC) in nine countries (the United Kingdom, France, Spain, Belgium, Poland, the United States, Argentina, Egypt and Mexico) found that despite the negative impact of their disease, a majority still enjoy life and desire public attention that recognizes their unique experiences. Based on the survey results, the international committee of experts overseeing the survey advocate tailored education programs to raise awareness of the needs of women with MBC. Results from this survey, which was conducted by Harris Interactive® and sponsored by Pfizer Oncology, were presented today at the 11th International Conference on Primary Therapy of Early Breast Cancer in St. Gallen, Switzerland. Among the reported findings from the BRIDGE Survey (Bridging Gaps, Expanding Outreach - Metastatic Breast Cancer Patient Survey), one in two women (53 percent) believe MBC receives too little public attention, and more than two in five women (44 percent) report being afraid to talk openly about their experiences. Nearly seven in 10 women (67 percent) desire increased public awareness of MBC, such as increased media attention of people living with MBC (53 percent) and recognition of public figures with MBC (49 percent). "In many countries, the public face of breast cancer has largely been focused on early stage disease, which has led to a deficiency of resources and attention for those who develop metastatic breast cancer," said Professor Lesley Fallowfield, director, Cancer Research UK Psychosocial Oncology Group, University of Sussex, UK, and BRIDGE steering committee member. "BRIDGE sheds light on the dire need for more public dialogue about metastatic breast cancer in an effort to make women feel more included among the broader breast cancer community." There are an estimated 1.3 million new cases of breast cancer each year. Breast cancer is the leading cause of cancer death among women worldwide, with an estimated 465,000 annual deaths. In developed countries, nearly 30 percent of women with early stage breast cancer will eventually develop metastatic (Stage IV) breast cancer - cancer that has spread beyond the breast to other parts of the body, including the bones, lungs, liver and brain. In developing countries, the majority of women with breast cancer are diagnosed with advanced stage or metastatic disease. Unlike early stage breast cancer, there are no curative therapies for MBC and patients undergo continuous treatment to control the spread of their disease and symptoms. Notably, while the majority (67 percent) of survey respondents recognize that MBC has negatively impacted most parts of their lives, most (66 percent) also say they are still able to enjoy life and 50 percent consider themselves to be a cancer "survivor". "The BRIDGE survey emphasizes the strength of the human spirit. With optimal support and resources, many women are able to live their lives well with metastatic disease for longer periods of time," said Musa Mayer, M.S., M.F.A., author, patient advocate and founder of AdvancedBC.org, and BRIDGE survey steering committee member. "This survey is an important first step in identifying the needs of this neglected patient population. It provides impetus for stakeholders worldwide to ensure that these women receive the best support and care." The survey also indicated the important role information plays in helping women cope with MBC, with updates on new research and treatment options the most desired. However, while 75 percent of respondents proactively seek out information on their own to learn about MBC, over two in five women (45 percent) encounter difficulties locating information and one in two (51 percent) report that available information does not meet their needs. "Despite its prevalence, women with metastatic breast cancer often experience feelings of isolation, as available information and attention from society range from being scant to sufficient, depending on country and cultural characteristics," said Musa Mayer. Members of the BRIDGE steering committee recommend that the survey results be used to improve collaboration among MBC stakeholders and enhance breast cancer initiatives worldwide, including but not limited to the creation of up-to-date and easily accessible information on MBC, and the development of education programs that promote public awareness of the disease. As the survey revealed women`s experiences with MBC vary by country, efforts to help women must be tailored to be culturally relevant where appropriate. About the BRIDGE Survey The BRIDGE Survey is a new, wide-reaching global assessment of the needs, experiences and attitudes of women living with MBC in multiple countries. This survey was conducted by Harris Interactive® on behalf of Pfizer Oncology and led by an international steering committee comprised of seven breast cancer thought leaders and advocates dedicated to addressing the unmet needs of the MBC community. The survey was conducted between September 16, 2008 and February 18, 2009 among 950 women with MBC age 18 and over in the United States, Europe, Latin America and Africa. The interviews were conducted using a combination of telephone, mail or in-person methods. More information on the methodology is available. For additional information about the BRIDGE Survey, please visit www.BridgeMBC.com. The international steering committee members, who were responsible for the development and contextualization of the survey, include: * Elyse S. Caplan, M.A., education director, Living Beyond Breast Cancer, United States; * Lesley Fallowfield, Bsc., DPhil., FMedSci., director, Cancer Research U.K., Sussex Psychosocial Oncology Group and Sussex Health Outcomes Research and Education (SHORE), Brighton and Sussex Medical School, United Kingdom; * Catherine Glennon, R.N., C.N.A., B.C., M.H.S., O.C.N., North American board member, International Society of Nurses in Cancer Care; nursing director of cancer services, University of Kansas Hospital, United States; * Adrian Huñis, M.D., assistant professor of internal medicine, University of Buenos Aires School of Medicine; head professor of oncology, Maimonides University, Argentina; * Musa Mayer, M.S., M.F.A., author and patient advocate, founder, AdvancedBC.org, United States; * Ruth Oratz, M.D., F.A.C.P., clinical associate professor of medicine, New York University School of Medicine, United States; and * Patricia Spicer, L.M.S.W., breast cancer program coordinator, Cancer Care, United States. Pfizer Oncology is committed to helping fulfill unmet educational and support needs for MBC patients worldwide and has embarked on a number of initiatives, including the sponsorship of an MBC Advocacy Working Group, a cooperative of patient advocates from seven countries, which recently issued a Consensus Report urging breast cancer stakeholders to improve collaboration and implement strategies to address unmet needs of women with MBC. This report was published in the December 2008 issue of the journal, Community Oncology. About Metastatic Breast Cancer Metastatic breast cancer (MBC) is the most advanced stage of breast cancer (Stage IV) and occurs when cancer has spread beyond the breast to distant parts of the body. Compared to early stage breast cancer, the prognosis for Stage IV breast cancer is poor, with the majority of breast cancer-related deaths resulting from complications of metastatic disease. While the life expectancy for patients with MBC is approximately two to three years, length of survival has continually increased since the 1990s due to advancements in diagnosis and treatment. Because metastatic breast cancer remains essentially incurable, current goals of therapy are focused on relieving symptoms, delaying tumor progression, improving quality of life, and prolonging survival. About Harris Interactive Harris Interactive is a global leader in custom market research. With a long and rich history in multimodal research, powered by their science and technology, they assist clients in achieving business results. Harris Interactive serves clients globally through their North American, European and Asian offices and a network of independent market research firms. CONTACT: Pfizer Media: Jack Cox, 212-733-5017 or Investors: Jennifer M. Davis, 212-733-0717 Pfizer Inc Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Amazon Defense Coalition: Chevron Lawyers Explode In Anger After More Oil Found at "Remediated" Sites In Ecuador Trial
entry.body: Tirade Marks End of Difficult Week of Setbacks for Chevron In $27 Billion Case COCA, Ecuador--(Business Wire)-- After a frustrating week of setbacks in an environmental trial in Ecuador`s rainforest, two Chevron lawyers exploded in anger at representatives of the victims after a technical expert demonstrated for the third time in a week that oil was visible at a well site that the company claimed to have "remediated" a decade ago, said lawyers for the plaintiffs in a lawsuit against Chevron. Chevron lead lawyer Adolfo Callejas, who was a lawyer for Texaco in Ecuador over the three decades that the company admitted to dumping billions of gallons of toxic waste into the country`s Amazon basin, on Thursday unleashed a tirade of personal insults at plaintiff`s lawyers Pablo Fajardo and Julio Prieto during a judicial inspection at a site called Auca Sur, deep in the Amazon jungle, said Fajardo and Prieto. Callejas repeatedly called Fajardo and Prieto "gallinas" (which translates literally as "hens") - a highly insulting and emasculating term in Ecuador culture. He also likened their legal arguments to the cackling sounds hens make, said Fajardo and Prieto. They also said, another Chevron lawyer, Alberto Racines, seemed to threaten Prieto by asking that they settle their differences in a rumble after the Auca Sur court hearing. Prieto, 27, is 5`8" and 150 pounds while Racines, in his late 40s, is a large and strongly-built man well over six feet. "Callejas is frustrated because his life`s work as a lawyer for Texaco in Ecuador is going up in flames as the company`s defense falls apart," said Prieto. "Racines has threatened me on multiple occasions during the trial." The tirade and apparent threat marked the end of a difficult week for Chevron in the long-running trial, where a final decision on a $27 billion damages claim is expected later this year. The company has told U.S. regulators that it expects "a significant adverse judgment" in the case while telling Ecuador`s indigenous leaders to expect a "lifetime of litigation" if they persist in pressing their claims. Both Fajardo, 37, and Prieto are Ecuadorian lawyers who have won international renown for their long battle to hold Chevron accountable for what experts believe is the worst oil-related disaster on the planet. Texaco admitted to dumping more than 18 billion gallons of toxic waste into Amazon waterways, and abandoning hundreds of waste pits gouged out of the jungle floor, when it operated an oil concession in Ecuador from 1964 to 1990. Chevron bought Texaco in 2001 and will bear any liability in the case, where soil and water damage cover an area roughly the size of Rhode Island. Callejas, who hails from a prominent Ecuador family that traces its lineage to the Spanish conquest, has served as Chevron`s lead counsel in the trial since it began in 2003. For several months, the plaintiffs have accused Chevron of violating various court edicts as part of a strategy to delay the trial indefinitely. Early in the week, Callejas was openly rebuked by the trial judge for seeking a last-minute postponement of a series of judicial inspections that for months Chevron had insisted take place, even though the evidentiary phase of the trial was all but completed last year. As the four inspections initially requested and then opposed by Chevron went forward last week, Callejas became increasingly embarrassed with the results. On Tuesday, at two separate Chevron well sites deep in the rainforest that the company claimed to have remediated, oil was clearly visible in the soil -- setting the stage for the tirade on Thursday. At the Aucua Sur site, the court-appointed technical expert, Marcelo Munoz, for the third time in a week lifted soil samples that contained shiny, visible oil sludge. The sight was almost too much to bear for Callejas, who lashed out at Fajardo and Prieto with his "hen" comment. After trial judge Juan Nunez cautioned Callejas to treat his younger adversaries with respect, he seemed to calm down. But tempers flared yet again when Racines told Prieto that "this is personal and we will see later how it ends." The "remediation" of the waste pits, the basis of Chevron`s defense at trial, has now become almost completely discredited in the eyes of scientists and independent court experts. Even before the inspections this week, 45 out of 54 waste pits purportedly "remediated" by Texaco and examined in the trial contained extensive levels of toxins, according to the independent court expert who worked with a team of 14 scientists to review the more than 62,000 chemical sampling results submitted as evidence. Several of the "remediated" sites have levels of toxins thousands of times higher than permissible norms in the U.S. and Ecuador, according to the court expert. Texaco claimed it had spent $40 million on the remediation, a paltry amount compared to the cost of a comprehensive clean-up, according to the court expert. Callejas angered Amazonian residents in an earlier phase of the trial when he insisted that oil does not cause cancer, contradicting decades of scientific research. He also said candy bar wrappers contain more lead than oil and that the Amazon rainforest was "an industrial production" zone rather than a delicate ecosystem. The trial in Ecuador began in 2003 after a U.S. federal judge in New York granted a request from Chevron that the case be transferred there because the courts there were a more adequate forum. When evidence in the Ecuador trial started to point to Chevron`s culpability, the company began to attack the very courts that it previously praised as fair. If accepted, the $27 billion damages award could be the largest ever for an environmental case. About the Amazon Defense Coalition The Amazon Defense Coalition represents dozens of rainforest communities and five indigenous groups that inhabit Ecuador`s Northern Amazon region. The mission of the Coalition is to protect the environment and secure social justice through grass roots organizing, political advocacy, and litigation. For Amazon Defense Coalition Karen Hinton, 703-798-3109 Karen@hintoncommunications.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Goldman fund eyes distressed debt market- FT
entry.body:
March 17 (Reuters) - Goldman Sachs Group Inc (GS.N) is asking investors in its $15 billion private equity fund for approval to shift much of its remaining uninvested money into distressed debt, the Financial Times reported on its website late on Monday.

"Given the dislocation we are facing in the credit markets, we believe the ability to achieve private equity-like returns at an even more senior position in the capital structure provides a significant opportunity for the fund," the paper cited the bank as telling investors.

Of the $9 billion remaining in the fund, Goldman plans to allocate $4.5 billion to stressed and distressed investments and increase open market purchases of both debt and equity securities from 10 to 25 percent of total commitments, the paper said.

Another $1.5 billion will go to firms that Goldman already owns in part to help them buy their own debt, the paper said, adding that only $3 billion will go to buy-outs, originally the only mission of the fund.

Goldman has invested $2 billion in the fund, including an additional $500 million injected recently, the paper said.

In recent months, many private equity firms have quietly shifted their focus to buying debt at a discount as they are unable to pay for acquisitions with cheap flexible debt as they could during the boom years, according to the paper.

Goldman could not be immediately reached for comment by Reuters. (Reporting by Ajay Kamalakaran in Bangalore, Editing by Ian Geoghegan)

entry.headline: JPMorgan hires Stanchart exec for SE Asia private equity
entry.body:
SINGAPORE, March 17 (Reuters) - JPMorgan (JPM.N) has hired Vibhav Panandiker, a former Standard Chartered (STAN.L) banker, as managing director to oversee the firm's private equity investments in Southeast Asia and India, the firm said.

The bank also hired Cathy Zhang as managing director for its Private Capital Asia unit and she will be responsible for the Greater China markets.

The bank said in an email on Tuesday it sees significant potential opportunities arising from the market downturn.

The economic slowdown and volatile markets have hurt dealmaking in the region, with many Western private equity firms taking a hit on their Asian portfolios.

Both Panandiker and Zhang will report to Varun Bery, head of Private Capital Asia, which operates from offices in Hong Kong, Mumbai, Singapore and Sydney. (Reporting by Saeed Azhar; Editing by Neil Chatterjee)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Disney puts Hong Kong expansion on hold
entry.body:
LOS ANGELES/HONG KONG (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co. has put the long-delayed expansion of its Hong Kong theme park on hold after failing to agree with the city's government on a cash infusion, the company said on Tuesday.

Disney and the Hong Kong government have been embroiled in protracted discussions over financing a second phase of the world's smallest Disneyland and the first on Chinese soil.

But Hong Kong Disneyland's visitor number projections failed to reach initial bullish predictions with the key Chinese tourist market now bogged down by a worldwide credit crunch and a decelerating economy that is discouraging travel.

Disney said it would fire about 30 Hong Kong-based employees dubbed "Imagineers" that had helped conceptualize and plan the expansion.

Some jobs might also go at Disney's home-turf of Burbank, California, as a result of the work stoppage, a source familiar with the situation told Reuters.

The source, who spoke on condition of anonymity, said that Disney had already been funding creative efforts -- designing and envisioning the look of rides -- but decided to pull financing when it became clear that a deal with the government on expanding Disneyland was not imminent.

"The uncertainty of the outcome requires us to immediately suspend all creative and design work on the project," the U.S. firm said in a statement.

The source however did not rule out a resumption of that effort should Disney eventually strike a deal with the city. Disney has also signed a framework agreement with the local government in Shanghai to kick off a project, and said in January it intended to submit a proper plan for the park.

The Hong Kong government expressed "grave concern" about the decision and urged Disney to reconsider.

"We consider that (Disney's) laying off of Walt Disney Imagineers who have been working on the design of Hong Kong Disneyland's expansion will not be conducive to the discussions and are puzzled by the company's decision," a spokesperson for the Commerce and Economic Development Bureau said in a statement.

Opened in 2005, Hong Kong Disneyland has been criticized for being far too small to attract repeat visitors despite its proximity to mainland China.

"Despite this setback, The Walt Disney Company remains confident and committed to the long-term success of Hong Kong Disneyland," Disney said.

An expansion could cost as much as HK$3 billion ($387 million), local media have reported. In December, the Sing Tao Daily newspaper reported that Disney -- in what was deemed an unusual concession -- may give the government a greater share in the project in repayment of a cash loan of nearly $800 million that the city had extended previously to the theme park.

Hong Kong residents and lawmakers, for their part, have queried the financial viability of pumping more public money into the struggling park, on top of the hundreds of millions of dollars already loaned to the project.

Disney has borrowed more than $1 billion for the project, including HK$6.1 billion it owed the city's government, due to be repaid over 25 years.

In 2008, the theme park was forced to amend loan agreements after it failed to meet performance targets. That amended pact abolished targets but decreased the amount of a revolving credit facility.

(Reporting by Gina Keating in Los Angeles and James Pomfret in Hong Kong; Editing by Nick Macfie)

entry.headline: UPDATE 1-Disney puts Hong Kong expansion on hold
entry.body:
(Adds details throughout)

LOS ANGELES/HONG KONG, March 17 (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co. (DIS.N) has put the long-delayed expansion of its Hong Kong theme park on hold after failing to agree with the city's government on a cash infusion, the company said on Tuesday.

Disney and the Hong Kong government have been embroiled in protracted discussions over financing a second phase of the world's smallest Disneyland and the first on Chinese soil.

But Hong Kong Disneyland's visitor number projections failed to reach initial bullish predictions with the key Chinese tourist market now bogged down by a worldwide credit crunch and a decelerating economy that is discouraging travel.

Disney said it would fire about 30 Hong Kong-based employees dubbed "Imagineers" that had helped conceptualise and plan the expansion.

Some jobs might also go at Disney's home-turf of Burbank, California, as a result of the work stoppage, a source familiar with the situation told Reuters.

The source, who spoke on condition of anonymity, said that Disney had already been funding creative efforts -- designing and envisioning the look of rides -- but decided to pull financing when it became clear that a deal with the government on expanding Disneyland was not imminent.

"The uncertainty of the outcome requires us to immediately suspend all creative and design work on the project," the U.S. firm said in a statement.

The source however did not rule out a resumption of that effort should Disney eventually strike a deal with the city. Disney has also signed a framework agreement with the local government in Shanghai to kick off a project, and said in January it intended to submit a proper plan for the park. [ID:nN09309290]

The Hong Kong government expressed "grave concern" about the decision and urged Disney to reconsider.

"We consider that (Disney's) laying off of Walt Disney Imagineers who have been working on the design of Hong Kong Disneyland's expansion will not be conducive to the discussions and are puzzled by the company's decision," a spokesperson for the Commerce and Economic Development Bureau said in a statement.

Opened in 2005, Hong Kong Disneyland has been criticised for being far too small to attract repeat visitors despite its proximity to mainland China.

"Despite this setback, The Walt Disney Company remains confident and committed to the long-term success of Hong Kong Disneyland," Disney said.

An expansion could cost as much as HK$3 billion ($387 million), local media have reported. In December, the Sing Tao Daily newspaper reported that Disney -- in what was deemed an unusual concession -- may give the government a greater share in the project in repayment of a cash loan of nearly $800 million that the city had extended previously to the theme park. [ID:nSHA340943].

Hong Kong residents and lawmakers, for their part, have queried the financial viability of pumping more public money into the struggling park, on top of the hundreds of millions of dollars already loaned to the project.

Disney has borrowed more than $1 billion for the project, including HK$6.1 billion it owed the city's government, due to be repaid over 25 years.

In 2008, the theme park was forced to amend loan agreements after it failed to meet performance targets. That amended pact abolished targets but decreased the amount of a revolving credit facility. [ID:nN30457416]

(Reporting by Gina Keating in Los Angeles and James Pomfret in Hong Kong; Editing by Nick Macfie)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Spitzenkonzern Coca-Cola veröffentlicht im Rahmen globaler Musikpartnerschaft die Single „Open Happiness"
entry.body: Die Coca-Cola Company und Atlantic Records bringen einige der angesagtesten Namen der Musikbranche zusammen, um den Soundtrack zu „Happiness Factory 3" aufzunehmen ATLANTA, USA--(Business Wire)-- Die Coca-Cola Company und Atlantic Records der Warner Music Group haben sich zusammengetan, um einen neuen Song unter Mitwirkung der angesagtesten Acts der Rock-, Pop- und Hip-Hop-Szene aufzunehmen und zu veröffentlichen. Der Titel kommt heute heraus, begleitet den dritten Werbespot von Coca-Cola aus der Happiness-Factory-Reihe und beinhaltet die aus fünf Noten bestehende Melodie, die durch die Werbung bekannt wurde. Unter dem Titel „Open Happiness" vereint die Single die Künstler Cee-Lo Green, Patrick Stump von Fall Out Boy, Brendon Urie von Panic at the Disco, Travis McCoy von den Gym Class Heroes sowie die gefeierte, Grammy-nominierte Sängerin Janelle Monae. Der Song spiegelt den Geist von positivem Denken, Optimismus und Spaß wider, der mit der weltweit einheitlichen Marketingkampagne „Open Happiness" für die Marke Coca-Cola ausgedrückt wird. Zwei Starproduzenten, Butch Walker (der den Titel zusammen mit Cee-Lo Green geschrieben hat) und Polow Da Don, haben das musikalische Gemeinschaftsprojekt produziert. Die preisgekrönten Produzenten haben es sich zum Ziel gesetzt, die Bereiche des Rock und Hip-Hop zu mischen und so einen topaktuellen Sound zu erschaffen, der die Open-Happiness-Kampagne zum Leben erweckt. Die Spitzenproduzenten zeichnen für einige der beliebtesten Musiktitel der letzten Jahre verantwortlich, und haben mit Künstlern wie Usher, Kelis, Pink, Fergie, den Pussycat Dolls, Avril Lavigne und Katy Perry gearbeitet. „Das Hinzufügen eines musikalischen Bereiches zu unserem beliebten Happiness-Factory-Franchise ist die natürliche Weiterentwicklung bei der Entstehung eines wahrlich medienübergreifenden Gutes", sagte Umut Ozaydinli, der weltweit zuständige Leiter des Musikmarketings der Coca-Cola Company. „Die Arbeit mit etablierten Künstlern wie Cee-Lo Green und Patrick Stump von Fall Out Boy sowie aufstrebenden Künstlern wie Janelle Monae führt zu einer wahrlich einzigartigen Mischung von Musikgenres. In unserer neuen Kampagne geht es darum, Menschen dazu aufzufordern, ein wenig Glück zu teilen und die einfachen Freuden des Lebens zu genießen. Wir glauben, dass wir durch die Verwendung von Musik in der Lage sind, diese Botschaft zu unterstreichen und es den Menschen zu erleichtern miteinander Kontakt aufzunehmen und Spaß mit der Kampagne zu haben." „Coca-Cola ist weltweit eine Marke mit riesigem Kultcharakter und mit einer reichen Geschichte von Qualität und Integrität", sagte Camille Hackney, Senior Vice President des Bereichs Brand Partnership and Commercial Licensing von Atlantic Records. „Bei Atlantic streben wir danach, Künstlerkarrieren zu schaffen, deren Musik weltweite Resonanz findet. Die Paarung der Künstler bei diesem Song für Coca-Cola ist eine perfekte Kombination, und wir glauben, dass er weltweit extrem erfolgreich sein wird." Musik wird ein zentraler Teil der Open-Happiness-Kampagne sein. Der Titel wird als Soundtrack zum neuen TV-Werbespot der Happiness-Factory-Reihe erscheinen und darüber hinaus als Werbemittel außerhalb der traditionellen Maßnahmen verwendet. Zudem wird ein Teil der Single-Verkäufe über die „Live Positively"-Plattform des Unternehmens für gemeinnützige Zwecke gespendet. Travis McCoy von den Gym Class Heroes fügte hinzu: „Ich glaube, es ist ein wirklich guter Schachzug von Coke, sowohl zu aufstrebenden als auch zu etablierten Künstlern zu greifen - damit geht jeder als Gewinner aus dem Projekt hervor. Wir als Künstler können mit Leuten zusammenarbeiten, zu denen wir aufblicken, und Coca-Cola bekommt einen frischen, neuen Song, von dem ich glaube, dass er beim Publikum wirklich gut ankommen wird." Cee-Lo Green fügte hinzu: „Ich glaube, was die Idee zunächst interessant gestaltete, war das Interesse von Coca-Cola an mir - das war reizvoll. Der Musikmarkt kann sehr unbeständig und nachtragend sein, und wenn man Langlebigkeit will, wenn man zur Legende werden will, wen könnte man dann besser um Rat fragen, als Coca-Cola?" Die Veröffentlichung der Single wird von einer umfangreichen weltweiten Offensive begleitet. Dazu gehören folgende Aktionen: * Die Weltpremiere des Titels auf MySpace verschafft den Konsumenten auf der ganzen Welt ab 16. März unter www.myspace.com/openhappiness erstmals Zugang zu diesem einzigartigen Gemeinschaftsprojekt. * Der Titel wird bei iTunes als exklusives Paket zusammen mit einem Making-of-Video erhältlich sein. * Auf 200 Millionen Coca-Cola-Packungen alleine in Großbritannien und Frankreich wird die Single „Open Happiness" genannt werden. * Ein Musikvideo des Titels mit den Künstlern unter der Regie des preisgekrönten Regisseurs Alan Ferguson wird im Mai weltweit seine Premiere feiern. * Der Titel wird in die Marketingbemühungen der Marke Coca-Cola im Radio und online eingebunden werden, womit auch die 3,2 Millionen Coke-Fans bei Facebook angesprochen werden. * Die weltberühmten Coca-Cola-Zeichen am Piccadilly Circus in London und am Times Square in New York werden für die Werbung für die Single „Open Happiness" genutzt. „Open Happiness" baut auf die preisgekrönte Kampagne „Coke Side of Life" auf und dient als Plattform für ein weltweit übergreifendes Marketing der Marke Coca-Cola. Die Kampagne wurde mit Printanzeigen, Plakaten und TV-Werbung im Januar zuerst in den USA gestartet. Die absolut durchgängige Kampagne - einschließlich neuer Verkaufsstellen, Werbeaktionen, Plakaten und Printanzeigen, digitaler bzw. Musikkomponenten und mehr - wird im ersten Halbjahr 2009 die Märkte auf der ganzen Welt erreichen. Über die Coca-Cola Company Die Coca-Cola Company ist das größte Getränkeunternehmen der Welt und versorgt die Verbraucher mit fast 500 sprudelnden und stillen Erfrischungsgetränkemarken. Neben Coca-Cola, der weltweit als am wertvollsten angesehenen Marke, enthält das Unternehmensportfolio 12 weitere Marken, die Milliarden von Dollar wert sind. Dazu gehören Diet Coke (Coca-Cola Light), Fanta, Sprite, Coca-Cola Zero, vitaminwater, POWERADE, Minute Maid und Georgia Coffee. Wir stehen als Anbieter von kohlensäurehaltigen Getränken, Säften und Fruchtsaftgetränken sowie trinkfertigen Tees und Kaffees weltweit an erster Stelle. Durch das weltweit größte Getränkevertriebsnetz können Verbraucher in über 200 Ländern die Getränke des Unternehmens mit einer Absatzmenge von 1,6 Milliarden Portionen pro Tag genießen. Aufgrund unseres dauerhaften Einsatzes, nachhaltige Gemeinschaften zu entwickeln, konzentriert sich unser Unternehmen auf Initiativen, die die Umwelt schützen, Ressourcen schonen und die wirtschaftliche Entwicklung der Gemeinschaften, in denen wir tätig sind, fördern. Weitere Informationen über unser Unternehmen erhalten Sie auf unserer Internetseite unter www.thecoca-colacompany.com. Über Atlantic Records Das Label Atlantic Records, das 2008 sein 60-jähriges Jubiläum feierte, steht aktuell an erster Stelle in der Musikbranche. Das Label wurde in New York City gegründet und entwickelte sich aus einem sprichwörtlichen Einzimmerbetrieb zu einer der weltweit wichtigsten Musikgesellschaften. Atlantic hat eine Reihe von Aufnahmen veröffentlicht, die einen einschneidenden Einfluss auf die Entwicklung der modernen Musik hatten. Zu dieser vielfältigen Geschichte gehören Musikikonen wie Ray Charles, Aretha Franklin, John Coltrane und Led Zeppelin. Heute umfasst die Künstlerkartei von Atlantic viele der beliebtesten Musiker, wie James Blunt, Tracy Chapman, Phil Collins, Death Cab for Cutie, Missy Elliott, Flo Rida, Lupe Fiasco, Gnarls Barkley, Kid Rock, Matchbox Twenty, Jason Mraz, O.A.R., Plies, Sean Paul, Rush, Shinedown, Staind, Rob Thomas, T.I. und viele mehr. ANMERKUNG DES VERFASSERS: Zusätzliche Materialien zum Start der neuen Kampagne stehen unter http://video360.world-television.com/HFIII/ zum Download zur Verfügung. Die Ausgangssprache, in der der Originaltext veröffentlicht wird, ist die offizielle und autorisierte Version. Übersetzungen werden zur besseren Verständigung mitgeliefert. Nur die Sprachversion, die im Original veröffentlicht wurde, ist rechtsgültig. Gleichen Sie deshalb Übersetzungen mit der originalen Sprachversion der Veröffentlichung ab. The Coca-Cola Company Judith Snyder, +1-404-676-2683 oder Atlantic Records: Sheila Richman, +1-212-707-3063 Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: ExxonMobil Makes Technology Investment in China
entry.body: BEIJING--(Business Wire)-- ExxonMobil Chemical Company announced today that it has made the final decision to build a technology center in Shanghai, China to provide product applications support for its growing business in the Chinese and Asian markets. "Over the next 10 years, we expect roughly 60 percent of the world`s petrochemical growth to occur in Asia, and we are rapidly expanding our manufacturing footprint through major capacity additions in Fujian, China and Singapore," said Steve Pryor, president, ExxonMobil Chemical Company. "The decision to build a technology center in Shanghai reinforces our long-term commitment to China and the region. The new investment will support our growing sales of premium products by providing innovative solutions to customer needs." ExxonMobil Chemical is an industry leader in the development and application of premium products that add value through enhanced product performance, energy efficiency, pollution prevention and greenhouse gas emission reduction. The new technology center will be built and operated by ExxonMobil Asia Pacific Research & Development Company Limited, and will be located in the Shanghai Zizhu Science-based Industrial Park. Laboratories and product demonstration facilities at the center will provide applications technical service and a range of applications development capabilities. The selection of Shanghai as the site for its new technology center reflects the importance of China in the business development and growth plans for ExxonMobil Chemical Company. "Asia, particularly China, provides unique growth opportunities for ExxonMobil," said Robert C. Davis, vice president, Global Technology, ExxonMobil Chemical Company. "This is reflected in our decision to build ExxonMobil Chemical`s newest technology center in China. We look forward to better serving the needs of our customers in China and the region." The technology center in Shanghai is expected to be operational in 2010. About ExxonMobil Chemical ExxonMobil Chemical is one of the world`s premier petrochemical companies with manufacturing, technology, and marketing operations around the world. The company delivers a broad portfolio of products and solutions efficiently and responsibly, with a commitment to create outstanding customer and shareholder value. ExxonMobil Chemical endorses the principles of sustainable development, including the need to balance economic growth, social development and environmental considerations. To learn more, visit www.exxonmobilchemical.com. Editor's notes: 1) The term "ExxonMobil Chemical Company" refers collectively to some or all of the companies affiliated with Exxon Mobil Corporation, and/or itself, which have chemical manufacturing and/or marketing operations around the world. 2) In China, ExxonMobil primarily operates through ExxonMobil (China) Investment Limited (EMCH), a wholly-owned company. ExxonMobil Asia Pacific Research & Development Company Limited is an EMCH affiliate established for ExxonMobil Research & Development activities in Asia Pacific, primarily in China. For ExxonMobil Chemical Company Su Ling: (86 10) 5965 7599 or Jeff Neu: (281) 870-6607 Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: El supergrupo Coca-Cola comienza a lanzar el disco simple "Destapa la felicidad" ("Open Happiness") en una asociación de música mundial
entry.body: The Coca-Cola Company y Atlantic Records reúnen a algunos de los nombres más famosos de la música para grabar la banda sonora de "La fábrica de la felicidad 3" ("Happiness Factory 3") ATLANTA--(Business Wire)-- The Coca-Cola Company y Atlantic Records de Warner Music Group se han unido para grabar y lanzar una canción nueva en la que participan algunos de los intérpretes más populares del mundo del rock, del pop y del hip hop. El tema, lanzado hoy, acompañará el tercer comercial de la serie "La fábrica de la felicidad" y utilizará la melodía de cinco notas que los avisos publicitarios hicieron famosa. Con el título "Destapa la felicidad", el disco simple ofrece los talentos combinados de Cee-Lo Green, Patrick Stump de Fall Out Boy, Brendon Urie de Panic at the Disco, Travis McCoy de Gym Class Heroes y de la cantante nominada al Grammy, Janelle Monae. La canción refleja el espíritu positivo, optimista y divertido expresado en "Destapa la felicidad", la nueva campaña de marketing integrada de la marca Coca-Cola. Dos productores superestrellas, Butch Walker (que escribió el tema junto con Cee-Lo Green) y Polow Da Don produjeron la colaboración musical. Estos productores premiados han comenzado a mezclar sus mundos de rock y hip-hop y a crear un sonido realmente de vanguardia que da vida a la campaña Destapa la felicidad. Además, los superproductores han sido los responsables de una parte de la música más popular de los últimos años y han trabajado, entre otros, con intérpretes como Usher, Kelis, Pink, Fergie, Pussycat Dolls, Avril Lavigne y Katy Perry. "Agregar un elemento musical a nuestra popular franquicia de La fábrica de la felicidad es una evolución natural para realmente convertirla en una propiedad integral en los medios", afirmó Umut Ozaydinli, gerente mundial de marketing musical de The Coca-Cola Company. "Trabajar con artistas de renombre, como Cee-Lo Green y Patrick Stump de Fall Out Boy, y con artistas con mucho futuro, como Janelle Monae, realmente reúne una combinación única de géneros musicales. Nuestra nueva campaña habla de invitar a las personas a compartir un poco de felicidad y a disfrutar los placeres simples de la vida. Creemos que, a través de la utilización de la música, podemos realzar este mensaje y ayudar a las personas a conectarse y a divertirse con la campaña". "Coca-Cola es una marca muy simbólica en todo el mundo, con una historia valiosa de calidad e integridad", indicó Camille Hackney, vicepresidenta de la Sociedad de Marcas y Licencias Comerciales de Atlantic Records. "En Atlantic luchamos por crear artistas de carrera que hagan música que resuene en todo el mundo. La unión de los artistas que participan en esta canción con la marca Coca-Cola es una combinación perfecta, y anticipamos que va a ser un éxito mundial enorme". La música estará muy arraigada dentro de la campaña Destapa la felicidad. El tema aparecerá como la banda de sonido del nuevo comercial televisivo La fábrica de la felicidad y se usará como un vehículo fuera de la publicidad tradicional. Además, se donará un porcentaje de las ventas del disco simple a obras benéficas a través de la plataforma "Vive positivamente" ("Live Positively") de la compañía. Travis McCoy, de Gym Class Heroes, comentó: "Pienso que el hecho de que Coca-Cola extienda una mano a los artistas con futuro y reconocidos es una decisión realmente buena: todos resultan ganadores. Nosotros, como artistas, tenemos la oportunidad de colaborar con personas que admiramos, y Coca-Cola consigue una canción fresca y nueva que creo que las personas van a estar realmente dispuestas a escuchar". Cee-Lo Green agregó: "Supongo que lo que fue interesante acerca de la idea al comienzo fue el interés de Coca-Cola en mí: eso fue tentador. El mercado de la música puede ser muy inconstante e implacable y si quiere una vida larga y una leyenda, ¿quién mejor para pedirle un consejo que Coca-Cola?". El lanzamiento del disco simple estará respaldado por una enorme campaña mundial que incluye: * Un estreno MySpace mundial del tema permitirá a los usuarios de todo el mundo acceder a esta colaboración única, por primera vez, que comienza el 16 de marzo en www.myspace.com/openhappiness. * El tema será lanzado a la venta en iTunes con un paquete exclusivo que ofrece un video de su realización. * 200 millones de paquetes de Coca-Cola sólo en Gran Bretaña y Francia incluirán una mención del disco simple de Destapa la felicidad. * En mayo, se estrenará en todo el mundo un video musical del tema en el que aparecen los artistas y que fue dirigido por el premiado director Alan Ferguson. * El tema estará integrado dentro de los esfuerzos de comercialización de la marca Coca-Cola en radio y en línea, junto con los 3,2 millones de fanáticos de Coca-Cola en Facebook. * Los carteles mundialmente famosos de Coca-Cola en Piccadilly Circus, en Londres, y en Times Square, en Nueva York, se utilizarán para promocionar el disco simple Destapa la felicidad. Destapa la felicidad se apoya en la premiada campaña El lado Coca-Cola de la vida (Coke Side of Life Campaign) y servirá como la plataforma de todo la mercadotecnia integrada para la marca Coca-Cola en todo el mundo. La campaña se lanzó primero en los EE.UU. en enero con publicidad impresa, exterior y en televisión. La campaña completamente integrada, lo que incluye nuevos puntos de venta, promociones, publicidad exterior e impresa, componentes digitales y musicales y mucho más, se lanzará, durante la primera mitad de 2009, en mercados de todo el mundo. Acerca de The Coca-Cola Company The Coca-Cola Company es la compañía de bebidas más grande del mundo, que refresca a consumidores con alrededor de 500 marcas de bebidas con gas y sin gas. Junto con Coca-Cola, reconocida como la marca más valiosa del mundo, la cartera de la compañía incluye otras doce marcas cuyo valor es de miles de millones de dólares, entre ellas Diet Coke, Fanta, Sprite, Coca-Cola Zero, Vitaminwater, POWERADE, Minute Maid y Georgia Coffee. A escala mundial, somos el proveedor N.o 1 de bebidas gaseosas, jugos, y tés y cafés listos para tomar. A través del sistema de distribución de bebidas más grande del mundo, los consumidores de más de 200 países disfrutan las bebidas de la empresa a un ritmo de mil seiscientos millones de unidades por día. Con el compromiso permanente de construir comunidades sustentables, nuestra empresa se centra en las iniciativas que protegen el medioambiente, preservan los recursos y mejoran el desarrollo económico de las comunidades en las que operamos. Para obtener más información sobre la compañía, visite nuestro sitio web en www.thecoca-colacompany.com. Acerca de Atlantic Records: Atlantic Records, que celebró su 60º Aniversario en 2008, se posiciona actualmente como la marca N.o 1 en la industria de la música. Fundada en la ciudad de Nueva York, la marca creció desde una sola habitación donde funcionaba, literalmente, hasta ser una de las compañías musicales más destacadas del mundo. De hecho, Atlantic ha lanzado una serie de grabaciones que han tenido un gran impacto en el curso de la música moderna; su rico historial incluye a íconos musicales como Ray Charles, Aretha Franklin, John Coltrane y Led Zeppelin. Hoy, la cartera de Atlantic incluye a muchos de los artistas que graban más famosos del mundo, entre ellos, James Blunt, Tracy Chapman, Phil Collins, Death Cab for Cutie, Missy Elliott, Flo Rida, Lupe Fiasco, Gnarls Barkley, Kid Rock, Matchbox Twenty, Jason Mraz, O.A.R., Plies, Sean Paul, Rush, Shinedown, Staind, Rob Thomas, T.I. y muchos más. NOTA DEL EDITOR: Puede descargar materiales para respaldar el lanzamiento de la nueva campaña en http://video360.world-television.com/HFIII/. El texto original en el idioma fuente de este comunicado es la versión oficial autorizada. Las traducciones solo se suministran como adaptación y deben cotejarse con el texto en el idioma fuente, que es la única versión del texto que tendrá un efecto legal. The Coca-Cola Company Judith Snyder, +1-404-676-2683 o Atlantic Records: Sheila Richman, +1 212 707 3063 Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: JPMorgan must let investors vote on bonus plan: U.S.
entry.body:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - JPMorgan Chase Co (JPM.N) must allow shareholders to vote on measures that would tie executive bonuses to the bank's long-term stock performance, U.S. regulators have ruled.

The AFL-CIO Reserve Fund, a union investment fund, had sought a shareholder vote to add the measures to JPMorgan's bylaws. The bank tried to prevent a vote from happening, citing logistical difficulties the move would create for shares already issued, but the SEC said in a letter dated March 9 that the vote should go ahead.

The fund is proposing that the bank's most senior executives keep 75 percent of their shares for two years after leaving the company. The fund is also proposing that JPMorgan's board of directors should prohibit these executives from hedging their shares to offset losses.

JPMorgan had wanted to reject the proposal in part because it may require the bank to impose restrictions on transferring shares already issued and because it has already made changes to executive bonuses, the bank said in a letter to the Securities and Exchange Commission.

But the SEC said the fund's proposal could be rewritten to make it clear it applies to compensation paid in the future, and if it is rewritten it cannot be excluded from proxy materials.

A JPMorgan spokesman declined immediate comment.

The AFL-CIO fund is an investment fund for the American Federation of Labor and Congress of Industrial Organizations. It has 2,515 shares in JPMorgan, according to a letter it sent to the bank in November.

Payouts for executives have come under scrutiny as financial stocks have slumped since the start of the credit crunch more than 18 months ago.

JPMorgan Chief Executive Jamie Dimon has already said he will not receive a bonus for 2008.

Shares in JPMorgan have fallen almost 25 percent since the start of the year.

(Reporting by Elinor Comlay; Editing by Gary Hill)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Pfizer sets guidance on 5-part debt sale - IFR
entry.body:
NEW YORK, March 16 (Reuters) - Pfizer Inc (PFE.N), the world's largest drugmaker, set price guidance for its five-part debt sale on Monday, said IFR, a Thomson Reuters publication.

The issue is expected to launch and sell on Tuesday.

The sale will likely consist of two-year floating-rate notes with price guidance of about 200 basis points more than the three-month London interbank offered rate, and three-year notes with price guidance set at about 310 basis points more than comparable U.S. Treasuries, said IFR.

The deal will also include a six-year tranche with guidance set in the area of 345 basis points over Treasuries, 10-year notes expected to price in the area of 330 basis points over Treasuries, and 30-year bonds with guidance set at about 350 basis points more than Treasuries.

Bank of America, Barclays, Citigroup, Goldman Sachs and JP Morgan are the joint lead managers of the deal. Pfizer is raising money to help fund its purchase of Wyeth WYE.N. (Reporting by Pam Niimi; Editing by Dan Grebler)

entry.headline: JPMorgan must let investors vote on bonus plan -US
entry.body:
NEW YORK, March 16 (Reuters) - JPMorgan Chase Co (JPM.N) must allow shareholders to vote on measures that would tie executive bonuses to the bank's long-term stock performance, U.S. regulators have ruled.

The AFL-CIO Reserve Fund, a union investment fund, had sought a shareholder vote to add the measures to JPMorgan's bylaws. The bank tried to prevent a vote from happening, citing logistical difficulties the move would create for shares already issued, but the SEC said in a letter dated March 9 that the vote should go ahead.

The fund is proposing that the bank's most senior executives keep 75 percent of their shares for two years after leaving the company. The fund is also proposing that JPMorgan's board of directors should prohibit these executives from hedging their shares to offset losses.

JPMorgan had wanted to reject the proposal in part because it may require the bank to impose restrictions on transferring shares already issued and because it has already made changes to executive bonuses, the bank said in a letter to the Securities and Exchange Commission.

But the SEC said the fund's proposal could be rewritten to make it clear it applies to compensation paid in the future, and if it is rewritten it cannot be excluded from proxy materials.

A JPMorgan spokesman declined immediate comment.

The AFL-CIO fund is an investment fund for the American Federation of Labor and Congress of Industrial Organizations. It has 2,515 shares in JPMorgan, according to a letter it sent to the bank in November.

Payouts for executives have come under scrutiny as financial stocks have slumped since the start of the credit crunch more than 18 months ago.

JPMorgan Chief Executive Jamie Dimon has already said he will not receive a bonus for 2008.

Shares in JPMorgan have fallen almost 25 percent since the start of the year. (Reporting by Elinor Comlay; Editing by Gary Hill)

entry.headline: McAfee, Inc. to Present along with Visa, Inc. and Economist Intelligence Unit at Visa Global Security Summit 2009
entry.body: SANTA CLARA, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- Dave DeWalt, president & CEO at McAfee, Inc. (NYSE: MFE) will present a keynote address at Global Security Summit in Washington D.C., on Thursday, March 19. WHAT: Dave DeWalt will discuss the latest trends in cybercrime, the global challenges to capture cybercriminals and the complexity organizations face today in realizing optimized security. He will highlight the need for a strategic approach to security that includes risk assessments and vigilance in proving compliance with mandates such as the payment card industry security standard PCI DSS. WHEN: Thursday, March 19, 2009 from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. EDT WHERE: Mandarin Oriental Hotel, 1330 Maryland Avenue, SW Washington, DC 20024 Visa Global Security Summit 2009, titled "Securing the Future of Payments," will take place on March 19. The Global Security Summit will address how all participants in the payments system can collaborate to keep the system secure from current and emerging security threats. For a complete agenda, please visit www.visasecuritysummit.com. About McAfee, Inc. McAfee, Inc., headquartered in Santa Clara, California, is the world's largest dedicated security technology company. McAfee is relentlessly committed to tackling the world's toughest security challenges. The company delivers proactive and proven solutions and services that help secure systems and networks around the world, allowing users to safely connect to the Internet, browse and shop the web more securely. Backed by an award-winning research team, McAfee creates innovative products that empower home users, businesses, the public sector and service providers by enabling them to prove compliance with regulations, protect data, prevent disruptions, identify vulnerabilities, and continuously monitor and improve their security. http://www.mcafee.com McAfee and/or other noted McAfee related products contained herein are registered trademarks or trademarks of McAfee, Inc., and/or its affiliates in the U.S. and/or other countries. entry.headline: Kaiser Permanente Teams With IBM to Enhance Technology-Powered Health Care
entry.body: ARMONK, NY and OAKLAND, CA, Mar 16 (MARKET WIRE) -- IBM (NYSE: IBM) and Kaiser Permanente today announced they have entered into a strategic agreement designed to ensure the continued leadership of Kaiser Permanente's information technology (IT) capabilities, which support the high-quality heath care delivered to the organization's 8.6 million members nationwide. The seven-year agreement was signed on March 13, 2009. As part of the agreement, IBM will leverage its global technology capabilities to manage Kaiser Permanente's data center operations, including computer systems, storage systems and associated software. Kaiser Permanente will continue to manage applications, including the organization's industry-leading electronic health record, Kaiser Permanente HealthConnect(TM). "Kaiser Permanente has led the health care industry in developing and using groundbreaking technology that connects the patient and physician in ways that enhance the quality of care and make health care more efficient," said Phil Fasano, chief information officer for Kaiser Permanente. "This agreement, grown out of our long-standing strategic relationship with IBM, will allow us to build on our leadership in health care technology, staying focused on the safety, satisfaction and privacy of our members and patients and ensuring that our physicians and clinicians continue to deliver real-time, personalized health care." "IBM sees information-based medicine helping propel health care from its currently unconnected local and regional sectors into a borderless industry that spans the globe," said Chris Nicoletti, IBM vice president, Healthcare and Life Sciences Industry. "IBM is pleased to work closely with Kaiser Permanente's industry-leading IT organization in efforts to make health care more interconnected, more instrumented and more intelligent. We are delighted to expand our long standing relationship by providing IT services that enable real-time health care." Each day, 14,000 physicians and thousands of other caregivers access KP HealthConnect and related IT systems to support care and service delivery. Additionally, 2.7 million members use My Health Manager on kp.org to access their online personal health record and other services, including secure email and prescription refills. The IBM strategic agreement will help ensure that these systems are available for use when and wherever they are needed. As a result of the agreement, about 700 positions in Kaiser Permanente's data center operations will be eliminated. Some of the affected employees will be eligible for employment with IBM. About IBM: For more information about IBM, please visit www.ibm.com/services. About Kaiser Permanente: Kaiser Permanente is America's leading integrated health plan. Founded in 1945, the program is headquartered in Oakland, California. Kaiser Permanente serves 8.6 million members in nine states and the District of Columbia. Today it encompasses Kaiser Foundation Health Plan, Inc., Kaiser Foundation Hospitals and their subsidiaries, and the Permanente Medical Groups. Nationwide, Kaiser Permanente includes approximately 164,000 technical, administrative and clerical employees and caregivers, and 14,000 physicians representing all specialties. The organization's Labor Management Partnership is the largest such health care partnership in the United States. It governs how more than 130,000 workers, managers, physicians and dentists work together to make Kaiser Permanente the best place to receive care, and the best place to work. For more Kaiser Permanente news, visit the KP News Center at: http://xnet.kp.org/newscenter. Contact(s) information: Jenna Gable IBM Media Relations (917) 472-3512 gablej@us.ibm.com Laura Dunn Kaiser Permanente (510) 267-2818 Laura.C.Dunn@kp.org Copyright 2009, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: IBM Website for Small- and Mid-Size Businesses Receives Four and a Half out of Five Stars
entry.body: ARMONK, NY, Mar 16 (MARKET WIRE) -- A new independent report out of technology industry analyst firm Forrester Research, Inc., assigns the IBM (NYSE: IBM) Web site (www.ibm.com) for small- and mid-size businesses four and a half out of five stars. In the February 23 report, ibm.com tied for the highest rating received among 30 technology companies reviewed. Forrester examined three sites including IBM's mid-size business portal (http://www-304.ibm.com/jct03004c/businesscenter/smb/us/en/), the small-business portal (http://www-304.ibm.com/jct03004c/businesscenter/smb/us/en/smallbusiness) and the new IBM Smart Market site (http://www.ibm.com/smartmarket/us/en/), which is organized by solution area. "IBM remains deeply committed to the SMB space and making it easier for our customers to find and use information via the Web," said Leslie Reiser, manager of Interactive Marketing for IBM's General Business group. "In addition to our long standing mid-sized business and small business portals, the new Smart Market provides an easy way for small- and mid-size organizations to find, buy and manage all of the applications they need to run a smarter business." The Forrester report, compiled by Tim Harmon, Peter Burris and Zachary Reiss-Davis, is titled, "A New SMB Market Phoenix Is Rising." It includes evaluations of Web sites based on 12 criteria, including content, navigation, links, and usability. The report states that "relative to large enterprises, smaller businesses shed fewer jobs in a recession and start hiring earlier as recessions abate." It also found that the small businesses that help catalyze the recovery this time around will be started by tech-savvy professionals who start their businesses with technology investments and a Millennial workforce that has grown up on mobile phones and social networks. Based on this, the report concludes that "Tech vendors that want to win in the new SMB space must provide sites with dedicated SMB solution sections -- or, better still, micro sites specific to the SMB audience." Contact: Jeff Gluck jgluck@us.ibm.com 914-765-6072 Copyright 2009, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: Red Bull, Microsoft, C3 Presents and Affliction Clothing Tap Mozes for Mobile Interaction at SXSW 2009
entry.body: Major Brands Choose Mozes to Create Mobile Ticketing, Pics-to-Screen, Text-to-Win and Mobile List Building Campaigns in Austin PALO ALTO, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- Mozes, the marketing service that connects people to what they love from their mobile phones, today announced its Mozes Connect Live Edition audience engagement platform is being used to help some of the biggest brand names and agencies in the world make a mobile impression at SXSW 2009. Mozes will be powering campaigns that include mobile ticketing, text-to-win, mobile list building and Mozes` newest feature, pics-to-screen. The extensive range of campaign options and mobile activities that can be facilitated by Mozes underscores the platform`s power, versatility and multidimensional nature; making it the ideal choice for marketers and event managers who are eager to quickly, easily and cost-effectively add an interactive mobile element to any type of campaign. "Today`s marketers recognize now more than ever how critical it is to maximize every dollar spent," said Greg Estes, VP of Marketing. "With this in mind, it`s very gratifying to have major brands and agencies like Red Bull, Microsoft, C3 Presents and Affliction Clothing choose the Mozes platform and recognize the value it delivers as a multidimensional mobile marketing solution. People come to SXSW for a one-of-a-kind experience, and it`s exciting to see our customers leveraging Mozes and the unique and personal nature of mobile to build connections with attendees and further enhance their South by Southwest experience." Mozes at SXSW 2009 SXSW attendees are invited to experience the power of Mozes mobile campaigns first-hand by checking out the following events: --Red Bull and Microsoft-- March 16: Experience Mozes` brand new pics-to-screen feature at Microsoft's PhizzPop Design Challenge Finale fueled by Red Bull at SXSW Interactive. The event marks the last stop of Microsoft's PhizzPop Tour and Online Competition. Partygoers can send their mobile photos of the night's event right up to the display screens for all to see. --C3 Presents-- March 19: Mozes pics-to-screen technology takes center stage at famed event producer and promoter C3 Presents 10th Annual Late Night bash at SXSW, sponsored by Playboy. Inside the venue and VIP rooms, event guests will be able to take mobile photos and send them to the display screen. --Affliction Clothing-- Thursday and Friday, March 19 and 20: Mozes is powering the company`s mobile ticketing and mob (mobile fan base) building campaigns. Festival attendees can text AFFLICTION to 66937 to RSVP to Maggie Mae's free day showcases on March 19th and 20th, while fans joining the Affliction mob will have the chance to text-in to win giveaways from Affliction Clothing and Gibson Guitar throughout the entire week. Meet Mozes at SXSW Mozes is eager to meet you! Join us for a hosted breakfast, including breakfast tacos and Bloody Marys at Maggie Mae`s, Thursday, March 19th and Friday, 20th from 11am-2pm. Text MOZESSXSW to 66937 to RSVP and gain entry to Mozes exclusive VIP areas-and be automatically entered in a drawing to win two passes to the C3 Presents/Playboy Party, March 19th. Members of the Press: Greg Estes, vice president of marketing at Mozes, will be attending SXSW 2009 from March 18-22. To schedule a specific press briefing please contact Ambient Public Relations: - Vicky Gray-Clark, vicky@ambientpr.com, (408) 243-8880, @vickygc1 (Twitter) - Laurie Guarino, lguarinopr@yahoo.com, (408) 876-7064 - Ray Ecke, ray@rightwordmedia.com, (973) 726-3797 Phone briefings will also be available after March 22nd to those journalists who are not attending the SXSW events. Additional information on Mozes can be found at www.mozes.com. Please feel free to publicly post the information above as you deem appropriate. About Mozes, Inc. Mozes is a leader in mobile marketing, used every day by some of the world's best-loved bands, brands, sports teams and organizations to build relationships with their fans through the mobile phone. Mozes helps its marketing partners in three ways: By providing a self-service web platform to create, deliver and analyze the effectiveness of mobile marketing campaigns; by providing strategic services that help its marketing partners to execute their mobile marketing strategy; and by providing in-venue services for live events, conferences and tours. Their customers benefit from a spam-free and consistent mobile experience they can trust, which results in increased participation, brand loyalty and ultimately more effective marketing campaigns. The desirability of reaching consumers via cell phone is growing according to eMarketer which projects U.S. spending on mobile marketing to reach $4.4 billion by 2011. Additional information on Mozes is available at www.mozes.com and at the company`s blog, http://www.mozes.com/blog. All trademarks contained herein are the property of their respective owners. entry.headline: UPDATE 1-Pfizer adds floating rate notes to debt sale-IFR
entry.body:
(Recasts lead. Updates with addition of floating rate note)

NEW YORK, March 16 (Reuters) - A floating rate note has been added to a bond sale by Pfizer Inc (PFE.N), the world's largest drug maker, which is raising cash to help purchase rival Wyeth WYE.N, according to IFR.

The five-part sale also includes fixed-rate notes in three-, six-, 10- and 30-year maturities, said IFR, a Thomson Reuters service. The offering is expected to price on Tuesday.

According to a buyside source, the three-year tranche may price at 310 basis points over comparable Treasuries. The six-year tranche may price at 330 basis points over Treasuries. New 10-year notes may price at 320 basis points, while 30-year bonds may price at about 330 basis points over Treasuries, the source said.

Bank of America/Merrill Lynch, Barclays Capital, Citigroup, Goldman Sachs and JP Morgan are joint bookrunners, according to one of the banks managing the sale. (Reporting by Tom Ryan; additional reporting by Dena Aubin; Editing by Jan Paschal)

entry.headline: UPDATE 3-Militants attack Chevron oil pipeline in Nigeria
entry.body:
* Chevron says 11,500 barrels per day of oil shut in

* Oil leakage in four communities

(Adds Chevron statement)

By Austin Ekeinde

PORT HARCOURT, Nigeria, March 16 (Reuters) - An attack by suspected Nigerian militants on a Chevron (CVX.N) oil pipeline in the Niger Delta on Friday shut down around 11,500 barrels per day of output, the U.S. energy firm said on Monday.

Chevron Nigeria Limited (CNL) said the attack on its 16-inch Makaraba-Utonana pipeline at around 0115 (0015 GMT) on Friday had forced it to shut in 11,500 bpd from its Makaraba Platform in Delta state.

Colonel Rabe Abubakar, spokesman for the military taskforce in the western Niger Delta, said the attack had resulted in leakage into four communities in the area.

"The company is currently assessing the situation and the incident has been reported to relevant government agencies," CNL, which operates a joint venture with Nigerian state oil firm NNPC, said in a statement.

Abubakar said the attackers were believed to have defected from the camp of Government Tompolo, a militant leader based in Delta state who had suspended attacks on oil sites.

"The group had threatened to continue with their attacks on installations and facilities unless they receive gratification from the multinationals," Abubakar said.

"This threat will not be allowed to continue."

Attacks on pipelines and industry installations are common in the Niger Delta, home to Africa's biggest oil and gas industry. The unrest has shut down more than a fifth of Nigerian oil output over the past three years.

Some attacks are carried out by militants who say they are fighting for a fairer share of the natural wealth, others by criminal gangs engaged in a multi-million-dollar trade in stolen oil. The crude is transported on barges to tankers waiting off Nigeria's coast before being mixed in with legitimate cargo.

Security experts say groups of local community youths, frustrated by poverty and a lack of job opportunities, also sabotage pipelines in the hope of winning repair contracts. (For full Reuters Africa coverage and to have your say on the top issues, visit: af.reuters.com/ ) (Additional reporting by Randy Fabi in Abuja; Writing by Nick Tattersall; editing by James Jukwey)

entry.headline: ExxonMobil Earns Prestigious Safety Awards from Gas Processors Association
entry.body: HOUSTON--(Business Wire)-- ExxonMobil Production Company`s U.S. operations have earned the Gas Processors Association (GPA) 2009 Company Safety Award and the President`s Award for Safety Improvement. Some 500 employees at the company`s gas processing facilities received the honors for outstanding safety performance during more than a million work hours. Gas Processors Association President Bob Dunn presented the awards at the 88th annual GPA Convention in San Antonio, Texas. "These safety awards are among the most important recognition we provide at this convention each year, because safety is a primary focus within all of our member companies," said Dunn, announcing the recipients. "The gas processing industry is one of the safest in the world." The President`s Safety Award recognizes continuous improvement in safety performance measured by a reduction of 25 percent or more in recordable incident rates over the past three years. This marks the third time in four years that ExxonMobil`s U.S. Production organization has earned the Company Safety Award from GPA. "The company has always set very high standards for safety performance," said Randy Cleveland, ExxonMobil U.S. Production Manager. "The achievement by our employees at gas processing facilities demonstrates their commitment to excellence in pursuing our vision that nobody gets hurt." ExxonMobil is one of the largest oil and gas producers and reserves holders in the United States. The U.S. portfolio is geographically diverse with significant positions in all major producing regions, including the Gulf Coast and the Gulf of Mexico, the Mid-Continent and Rockies, onshore and offshore California, and Alaska. Photos/Multimedia Gallery Available: http://www.businesswire.com/cgi-bin/mmg.cgi?eid=5918254=en ExxonMobil Upstream Media Relations, 713-656-4376 Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Chevron says 11,500 bpd shut in after Nigeria attack
entry.body:
LAGOS, March 16 (Reuters) - U.S. energy firm Chevron (CVX.N) said on Monday an attack on Friday on one of its oil pipelines in southern Nigeria's Niger Delta had shut in 11,500 barrels per day of production.

"Chevron Nigeria Limited ... confirms that there was a breach on its 16-inch Makaraba-Utonana pipeline at about 0115 hours on Friday, March 13, which has led to the shut in of 11,500 bpd from its Makaraba Platform in Delta State," the firm said in a statement. (Reporting by Nick Tattersall)

entry.headline: UPDATE 1-Goldman Sachs says buy Goodrich, sell Spirit
entry.body:
March 16 (Reuters) - Goldman Sachs raised its rating on Goodrich Corp GR.N and downgraded Spirit Aerosystems Inc (SPR.N), saying investors should go long on aerospace stocks with significant aftermarket exposure and short those with original equipment (OE) exposure.

The brokerage raised Goodrich to "buy" from "neutral" and cut Spirit to "sell" from "neutral," while reiterating its "sell" on plane maker Boeing Co (BA.N).

Goodrich has the most favorable mix of business with 36 percent of revenue from aftermarket, while Spirit gets 95 percent of its revenue from OE, analyst Noah Poponak said in a note to clients dated March 15.

Aftermarket revenue is driven by traffic growth, which should grow in 2010 and 2011, while OE revenue is driven by Boeing and EADS's EAD.PA Airbus production, Poponak added.

The analyst also cut his delivery estimates for Boeing by 10 percent for 2010 and 2011, given the bleak economic outlook, and to better align his forecast for margin and revenue declines.

"Our historical analysis shows that aftermarket-exposed companies have outperformed in this part of the cycle," he noted.

Goodrich could be potentially attractive to other larger aerospace companies, Poponak said.

The analyst expects earnings to trough in 2010 for Goodrich , and 2011 for Spirit and Boeing.

Boeing shares rose 2 percent to $33.96, while Spirit shares fell 7 percent to $9.31. Goodrich shares rose 5 percent in morning trade on the New York Stock Exchange. (Reporting by Dhanya Ann Thoppil in Bangalore; Editing by Anil D'Silva)

entry.headline: U.S. Bank y AeroMéxico ofrecen a los pasajeros una nueva forma de obtener beneficios con la tarjeta AeroMéxico Visa y la línea exclusive de la tarjeta AeroMéxico Visa Signature
entry.body: MINNEAPOLIS--(Business Wire)-- Los residentes estadounidenses que visitan México ahora pueden obtener beneficios con sólo usar la nueva tarjeta AeroMéxico Visa o AeroMéxico Visa Signature para hacer sus compras. U.S. Bank y AeroMéxico ahora ofrecen a sus clientes la oportunidad de acumular Millas Premier en su cuenta Club Premier de AeroMéxico por todas las compras que realicen. Podrán redimir sus Millas para viajar desde los 16 aeropuertos donde AeroMéxico presta sus servicios de vuelo en Estados Unidos a más de 40 destinos en México, así como otros destinos internacionales muy populares entre los que se encuentran Buenos Aires, Madrid, París, Roma, Sao Paulo, Shangai y Tokio en la red global de vuelos de la aerolínea. Además, la participación de AeroMéxico en la alianza aérea global SkyTeam mejora aún más la posibilidad de viajar a cientos de destinos adicionales en todo el mundo. "La tarjeta AeroMéxico Visa ofrece valiosas oportunidades que los pasajeros podrán aprovechar para obtener beneficios de viajes para los residentes estadounidenses y los pasajeros de negocios que viajan con frecuencia a México y otros destinos", aseveró Pat Coll, vicepresidente ejecutivo de Soluciones de Pagos Minoristas de U.S. Bank. "Esta alianza representa la combinación ideal con la experiencia que ofrece U.S. Bank como uno de los principales emisores de tarjetas de crédito en Estados Unidos y el estatus que ostenta AeroMéxico como la aerolínea más grande de México. La nueva tarjeta AeroMéxico Visa lleva los beneficios que ofrece el programa de viajero frecuente a un nuevo público, residente en Estados Unidos, con importantes oportunidades de crecimiento en mercados clave". Frank Galán, vicepresidente de operaciones de AeroMéxico en Estados Unidos, señaló, "Las nuevas tarjetas AeroMéxico Visa y AeroMéxico Visa Signature son incorporaciones excepcionales a los muchos beneficios que disfrutan nuestros pasajeros con el estilo premier de nuestros servicios. Nuestros clientes en Estados Unidos que utilizan estas tarjetas recibirán nuevos beneficios cada vez que compren o viajen con AeroMéxico a cualquiera de nuestros más de 65 destinos internacionales en México y todo el mundo". "Los tarjetahabientes AeroMéxico Visa y AeroMéxico Visa Signature también se convertirán automáticamente en Socios Club Premier, el Programa de viajero frecuente de AeroMéxico que ofrece acceso a otros beneficios de viaje, tales como ascensos de clase y el uso de nuestros salones VIP en aeropuertos. Tanto los pasajeros que viajan por placer y por negocios disfrutarán de las múltiples ventajas de este programa", agregó Galán. Los tarjetahabientes de la nueva tarjeta AeroMéxico Visa obtendrán el beneficio adicional de un bono de hasta 20,000 millas (para los titulares de la tarjeta AeroMéxico Visa Signature) así como un Boleto gratuito para un Acompañante al inscribirse en el programa, descuentos en la compra de boletos aéreos a través del Internet y acumulación doble de millas por los boletos de avión que compren con la tarjeta. Para mayor información visite www.aeromexicovisa.com. U.S. Bank ha emitido tarjetas corporativas y para consumidores individuales durante décadas, y ha apoyado a la industria de la aviación durante muchos años a través de sus alianzas con programas de viajero frecuente. La empresa también ofrece servicios de procesamiento de tarjetas para más de 80 aerolíneas en todo el mundo a través de su subsidiaria Elavon. U.S. Bank además apoya a flotas de aviones corporativos y privados con la tarjeta U.S. Bank Multi Service Aviation que es aceptada por más de 7,000 proveedores de servicios de aviación en más de 190 países. AeroMéxico opera Club Premier, el programa más grande de viajero frecuente en México que tiene más de 2 millones de socios en diferentes partes del mundo que disfrutan de una amplia gama de beneficios que tienen a su disposición. Los beneficios de la membresía Club Premier incluye millas gratis, ascensos gratuitos, acceso a la red de Salones Premier en los principales aeropuertos del mundo y promociones exclusivas que la aerolínea ofrece a sus socios. AeroMéxico y su subsidiaria, AeroMéxico Connect, actualmente operan más de 600 vuelos diarios entre 16 ciudades de Estados Unidos y más de 40 destinos en México, incluyendo sus operaciones centrales en el Aeropuerto Internacional de la Ciudad de México, así como el servicio de conexión a destinos internacionales, como Tokio, París y Buenos Aires entre otros 12 países alrededor del mundo. Las ciudades estadounidenses en donde actualmente opera son Los Ángeles, Ontario (California), San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle-Tacoma, Las Vegas, Phoenix, Albuquerque, Denver, San Antonio, Houston, Chicago, Atlanta, Nueva York, Orlando y Miami. El primer servicio canadiense de la aerolínea comenzó el 3 de marzo a Toronto y servicio a Montreal comenzará el 2 de abril.AeroMéxico Vacations brinda paquetes vacacionales a medida por todo esta red. La aerolínea también ofrece servicios internacionales adicionales a través de la alianza aérea mundial SkyTeam, junto con 10 aerolíneas alrededor del mundo. AeroMéxico ha sido reconocida internacionalmente por su premiado estilo de servicio personalizado en vuelo, uno de los mejores records de vuelos a tiempo, las mayores calificaciones según las normas de seguridad y calidad, extraordinaria confiabilidad y desempeño en el manejo de equipaje, y el valor excepcional basado en sus tarifas competitivas y su servicio superior. Para mayor información, visite www.aeromexico.com o llame al 1-800-237-6639. U.S. Bancorp (NYSE: USB), que cuenta con $266 mil millones de dólares en activos, es la empresa tenedora de U.S. Bank, el sexto banco comercial más grande en los Estados Unidos a partir del 30 de septiembre de 2008. La empresa tiene 2,791 sucursales bancarias y 5,164 cajeros automáticos, y ofrece una amplia gama de servicios bancarios, de corretaje, seguros, inversiones, hipotecas, fideicomisos y productos de servicios de pagos a consumidores individuales, empresas e instituciones. Visite el sitio de Internet de U.S. Bancorp en www.usbank.com. El texto original en el idioma fuente de este comunicado es la versión oficial autorizada. Las traducciones solo se suministran como adaptación y deben cotejarse con el texto en el idioma fuente, que es la única versión del texto que tendrá un efecto legal.
